meanings.definition: Lithophanes: objects made of porcelain or other materials that are translucent when backlit, creating a three-dimensional image.
meanings.sent1: The lithophanes on display at the museum were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: She collected various lithophanes to decorate her living room.
meanings.sent3: The lithophanes seemed to come alive under the soft glow of the lamp.
meanings.sent4: The lithophanes transformed into magical scenes when placed in front of a light source.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the lithophanes were revealed when light passed through them.

meanings.definition: Lithophanes: the art or process of creating such objects.
meanings.sent1: Creating lithophanes requires precision and skill.
meanings.sent2: The artist specialized in the delicate art of lithophanes.
meanings.sent3: She tried her hand at lithophanes but ended up with a lopsided figure.
meanings.sent4: The workshop offered a class on lithophanes for beginners.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of lithophanes lies in their intricate designs and play of light.
